extends java.lang.Object

      java.lang.String bid(java.lang.String auctionId, java.lang.String bidAmount)
      The conditions for a successful bid is contained in canBid(AuctionInfoDTO) and also, the new bid must be greater than the current maximum bid + 5% of the target price of the auction.

      boolean canBid(AuctionInfoDTO auctionInfoDTO)
      The current user can bid to the auction only if it is not the admin, it is not the auction creator, the auction has not ended and the last bid (the maximum) is not already his/her bid.

    • Method Detail

      • bid

        public java.lang.String bid(java.lang.String auctionId,
                            java.lang.String bidAmount)
        The conditions for a successful bid is contained in canBid(AuctionInfoDTO) and also, the new bid must be greater than the current maximum bid + 5% of the target price of the auction.
        Parameters:
        auctionId - the id of the action contained in auction_info table
        bidAmount - the amount the user is trying to bid for this auction
        Returns:
        String containing the error message (if couldn't bid) or an "OK" marking a successful bid

      • canBeManuallyDone

        public boolean canBeManuallyDone(AuctionInfoDTO auctionInfoDTO)
        Parameters:
        auctionInfoDTO - object containing information about the auction
        Returns:
        boolean stating whether or not the auction ca be completed manually (an auction that haven't reached the target price can be completed manually by the auction creator)

      • canBid

        public boolean canBid(AuctionInfoDTO auctionInfoDTO)
        The current user can bid to the auction only if it is not the admin, it is not the auction creator, the auction has not ended and the last bid (the maximum) is not already his/her bid.
        Parameters:
        auctionInfoDTO - object containing information about the auction
        Returns:
        boolean stating whether or not the current user can bid to the auction

      • createAuction

        public void createAuction(java.lang.String phones_in_auction,
                          java.lang.String datetime_end,
                          java.lang.String additional_info,
                          java.lang.String starting_price,
                          java.lang.String target_price)
        Method used to create a new auction with the information specified by the input parameters.

      • createPhone

        public void createPhone(java.lang.String phone_brand,
                        java.lang.String phone_model)
        Method used to create a new phone.

      • deleteAuction

        public void deleteAuction(java.lang.String id)
        Method used to delete the auction specified by parameter. This also deletes all the information from the database regarding the auction.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the auction

      • getAuctionInfo

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAuctionInfo(java.lang.String auction_info_id)
        Parameters:
        auction_info_id - the id of the auction
        Returns:
        HashMap containing the auction information specified by the input parameter.

      • getAuctionInfoDTOS

        private java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> getAuctionInfoDTOS(java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> activeAuctions,
                                                          java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>> activeAuctionsMap)
        Helper method to convert from data from the database to objects.

      • manuallyDoAuction

        public boolean manuallyDoAuction(java.lang.String id)
        This method will try to manually complete an auction as requested by the user. Will only work if all the following requirements are met: 1. the end datetime has passed 2. the auction is not already completed - i.e. it doesn't already have a winner
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the action contained in auction_info table
        Returns:
        a boolean stating whether the auction has been successfully completed manually

      • retrieveActiveAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveActiveAuctions()
        Returns:
        java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> containing the currently active auctions

      • retrieveActiveAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveActiveAuctions(java.lang.String[] phones_in_auction_array,
                                                             java.lang.String startingPrice,
                                                             java.lang.String currentPrice,
                                                             java.lang.String targetPrice,
                                                             java.lang.String sellerName)
        Returns:
        List<AuctionInfoDTO> containing all the actives auctions filtered by the given input parameters

      • retrieveAuctionInfo

        public AuctionInfoDTO retrieveAuctionInfo(java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the auction
        Returns:
        AuctionInfoDTO containing the information of the auction with the id specified by parameter.

      • retrieveAvailablePhones

        public java.util.List<AvailablePhonesDTO> retrieveAvailablePhones()
        Returns:
        java.util.List<AvailablePhonesDTO> containing all the available phones that can be added to an auction.

      • retrieveAvailablePhonesAndPhonesInAuction

        public java.util.List<AvailablePhonesDTO> retrieveAvailablePhonesAndPhonesInAuction(java.lang.String auction_info_id)
        Parameters:
        auction_info_id - the id of the auction
        Returns:
        List<AvailablePhonesDTO> containing all the available phones that can be added to an auction, but also the ones that are already added to the auction specified by the input parameter.

      • retrieveAvailablePhonesWithoutBrand

        public java.util.List<AvailablePhonesDTO> retrieveAvailablePhonesWithoutBrand()
        Returns:
        List<AvailablePhonesDTO> containing all the available phones that can be added to an auction, without specifying the phone brand.

      • retrieveBidsForAuction

        public java.util.List<BidDTO> retrieveBidsForAuction(java.lang.String id)
        This method retrieved the auctions, completely with info about the winner / highest bidder.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the auction
        Returns:
        java.util.List<BidDTO> containing the bid of the auction specified by the parameter.

      • retrieveInactiveAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveInactiveAuctions()
        Method used to retrieve the all the inactive auctions.

      • retrieveInactiveAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveInactiveAuctions(java.lang.String[] phones_in_auction_array,

                                                               java.lang.String targetPrice,
                                                               java.lang.String sellerName)

      • retrieveMyActiveAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveMyActiveAuctions(java.lang.String userId)
        Method used to retrieve the active auctions of the user specified by parameter.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user

      • retrieveMyBidsByAuction

        public java.util.List<AuctionWithBidsDTO> retrieveMyBidsByAuction(java.lang.String userId)
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user
        Returns:
        java.util.List<AuctionWithBidsDTO> containing only the bids of the current logged in user specified by the parameter, also with information regarding the status (winner / highest bidder) and if the auction is ended and the current user is the winner, it also gives the option to review the auction.

      • retrieveMyInactiveAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveMyInactiveAuctions(java.lang.String userId)
        Method used to retrieve the inactive auctions of the user specified by parameter.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user

      • retrieveMyNotValidatedAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveMyNotValidatedAuctions(java.lang.String userId)
        Method used to retrieve the not-validated auctions of the user specified by parameter.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user

      • retrieveNotValidatedAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveNotValidatedAuctions()
        Method used to retrieve all the not validated auctions.

      • retrieveNotValidatedAuctions

        public java.util.List<AuctionInfoDTO> retrieveNotValidatedAuctions(java.lang.String[] phones_in_auction_array,
                                                                   java.lang.String startingPrice,
                                                                   java.lang.String currentPrice,
                                                                   java.lang.String targetPrice,
                                                                   java.lang.String sellerName)
        Method used to retrieve all the not validated auctions filtered by the input parameters.

      • retrievePhonesInAuction

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> retrievePhonesInAuction(java.lang.String auction_info_id)
        Parameters:
        auction_info_id - the id of the auction
        Returns:
        Lis<String> containing all the phones that are already added to the auction, specified by the input parameter.

      • retrievePriceIntervals

        public java.lang.String[] retrievePriceIntervals()
        Method used to retrieve price intervals for filtering auctions under "/auctions" endpoint.
        Returns:
        String[]: 0: targetPriceMin 1: targetPriceMax 2: startingPriceMin 3: startingPriceMax 4: currentPriceMin 5: currentPriceMax

      • retrievePriceIntervalsForAdmin

        public java.lang.String[] retrievePriceIntervalsForAdmin()
        Method used to retrieve price intervals for filtering auctions under "/auctions" endpoint. It is specially built for admins, as they can see the active, ended and not-validated auctions.
        Returns:
        String[]: 0: targetPriceMin 1: targetPriceMax 2: startingPriceMin 3: startingPriceMax 4: currentPriceMin 5: currentPriceMax

      • scheduleAuctionEnd

        public void scheduleAuctionEnd(java.lang.String id,
                               java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime)
        This method will schedule a job (see AuctionService.AuctionHandler) to be executed at auction ending datetime. This will be successfully scheduled only if the auction is not already ended.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the auction that will be scheduled for ending
        endDateTime - the date of the auction ending

      • updateAuction

        public void updateAuction(java.lang.String auction_info_id,
                          java.lang.String phones_in_auction,
                          java.lang.String datetime_end,
                          java.lang.String additional_info,
                          java.lang.String starting_price,
                          java.lang.String target_price)
        Method used to edit an already existing auction specified by the input parameters.

      • userHasAccessToAuction

        public boolean userHasAccessToAuction(java.lang.String auction_info_id)
        Parameters:
        auction_info_id - the id of the auction
        Returns:
        boolean stating whether or not the auction is accessible by the current user (the user created it or not)

      • validateAuction

        public void validateAuction(java.lang.String id)
        Method used to validate the auction specified by parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the auction
